ingredients.ingredient: 1 pint fresh strawberries, hulled and cored
3 graham crackers, crushed, or as needed

cookingTips: Hull strawberries from the bottom to create a pocket without cutting through the top
Beat cream cheese with powdered sugar until light and fluffy before piping
Pipe filling into strawberries and immediately roll in crushed graham crackers for crunch
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can the tartness of fresh strawberries complement the creamy sweetness of the filling?
